original_text: When I say that, it is not because I need anything. I have learned to be happy, whatever things may happen to me.
korean_text: 내가 궁핍하므로 말하는 것이 아니니라 어떠한 형편에든지 나는 자족하기를 배웠노니

sentences.original_text: it is not because I need anything
I have learned to be happy
whatever things may happen to me
